ZIGZ_AUTO_ENABLE.Description: Allows you to enable (1) or disable (0) ZigZag auto feature

ZIGZ_DIRECTION.Description: The direction to move sideways in ZigZag mode

ZIGZ_LINE_NUM.Description: Total number of lines for ZigZag auto if 1 or more. -1: Infinity, 0: Just moving to sideways

ZIGZ_SIDE_DIST.Description: The distance to move sideways in ZigZag mode

ZIGZ_SPRAYER.Description: Enable the auto sprayer in ZigZag mode. SPRAY_ENABLE = 1 and SERVOx_FUNCTION = 22(SprayerPump) / 23(SprayerSpinner) also must be set. This makes the sprayer on while moving to destination A or B. The sprayer will stop if the vehicle reaches destination or the flight mode is changed from ZigZag to other.

ZIGZ_WP_DELAY.Description: Waiting time after reached the destination
